Module: camera_anim

camera_anim

Camera animation add-on. Provides support for camera procedural animation.
Source:
  • addons/camera_anim.js, line 3

Methods

<static> auto_rotate(auto_rotate_ratio)

Auto rotate camera around object
Parameters:
Name Type Description
auto_rotate_ratio Speed ratio of the camera

<static> track_to_target(camobj, target, rot_speed, zoom_mult, zoom_time, zoom_delay, callback)

Track camera to target
Parameters:
Name Type Description
camobj Camera Object ID
target Target object or target position
rot_speed Rotation speed in radians per second
zoom_mult The multiplicity of zooming to the object
zoom_time Zooming time
zoom_delay Delay after zooming
callback Optional callback
